Das Langly-Plugin f\u00fcr MkDocs ist ei.en-us: The Langly plugin for MkDocs is a plugin that provides language support and translations for websites created with MkDocs using the Material theme. It enables easy management of multilingual content and automatic translation of texts to reach a wider audience. It deliberately does not comply with any of the current translation standards, but takes a completely unique but open approach.

Dieses Plugin wurde f\u00fcr Verwendung.en-us: This plugin was created to use the great Material theme and offers functionalities to e.g. internationalize the blog area.

<strong>Die derzeit einzige \u00dcberset.en-us: The only translation engine currently available is Deepl and a DeepL api key is required to use the plugin.

Diese Auflistung sind Plugins, die bei d.en-us: This list includes plugins that were used directly in the development of Langly and are considered compatible.

<strong>Aber es ist nicht ausgeschlossen.en-us: But it is not impossible that other plugins will also work.

Diese gro\u00dfartigen Plugins ben\u00f6.en-us: These great plugins definitely need full support and recognition.

Das Plugin ist noch in der Entwicklung u.en-us: The plugin is still under development and it is recommended to read the documentation to understand the functionalities and limitations. I also ask you to report all requirements and suggested changes in the GitHub issues.

F\u00fcr den Anfang werden ein paar vorl.en-us: To get started, a few preliminary steps are required to use the plugin.

Um das Plugin zu verwenden, m\u00fcssen.en-us: To use the plugin, you must first install it. To do this, execute the following command:

Um das Plugin zu verwenden, ben\u00f6tig.en-us: To use the plugin, you need a Deepl API key. You can obtain this free of charge from the Deepl website.

Nachdem Sie den Api-Key erstellt haben,.en-us: After you have created the api key, create a file called auth_key.json in the root directory of your project and add the following content:

Ersetzen Sie <code>DEEPL-API-KEY</code>.en-us: Replace DEEPL-API-KEY with your own api key.

Bitte lesen Sie diesen Abschnitt sorgf\u.en-us: Please read this section carefully and be sure to exclude the Api key in the .gitignore and also protect it in every possible way from being uploaded to the Internet.

\u00d6ffnen Sie die Datei .gitignore im.en-us: Open the .gitignore file in the root directory and add the line auth_key.json to prevent the file from being uploaded by mistake. Then check online that the key cannot be found in the repo.

Nach der Installation k\u00f6nnen Sie da.en-us: After installation, you can activate the plugin in your mkdocs.yml. Langly should be the last plugin in the list.

Es m\u00fcssen keine sprachbezogenen Ein.en-us: No language-related settings need to be made in the Material theme. This means that the theme>language and extra>alternate options are set by the plugin.

In dieser Konfiguration wird die Sprache.en-us: In this configuration, German is set as the source language and English as the target language. You can add as many target languages as you like. However, this will affect the serve performance all the more. The site_url option should correspond to the publication address of your website so that the sitemap and canonicals function correctly.

Wichtig ist dabei die Deepl-Language-Cod.en-us: It is important to use the Deepl language codes for source and target. These can be found on the following website:

Nachdem Sie die Konfiguration vorgenomme.en-us: Once you have made the configuration, you can use the translation functions in your Markdown files.

Gehen sie wie folgt vor, um Texte zu mas.en-us: Proceed as follows to mask texts

Der Text innerhalb der Maskierung wird d.en-us: The text within the masking is then automatically translated by Langly.

Einf\u00fcgen einer \"index.html\" mit U.en-us: Insert an "index.html" with redirection to the target language according to the browser language.

Konfigurieren Sie MKDocs und das Materia.en-us: Configure MKDocs and the material theme for each build in the respective language.

Optionale Sprachumschaltung, die automat.en-us: Optional language switching, which is configured automatically.

Setzen aller offenen \u00dcbersetzungen.en-us: Set all open translations to draft mode during serve to minimize access to the translation api.

Durchsuchen des Seiteninhaltes, um zus\u.en-us: Browse page content to find additional translations created with third-party plugins such as mkdocs-strings.

Speichern aller \u00dcbersetzungen in ei.en-us: Save all translations in one JSON file per page to minimize access to the translation api and allow manual changes.

Konvertiert Markdown in HTML, \u00fcbers.en-us: Converts Markdown to HTML, translates and converts back to get text formatting like code, strong and em.

Fixe-W\u00f6rter in Code-Tags mit tempor.en-us: Get fixe words in code tags with temporary HTML attributes.

Kopieren Sie die f\u00fcr gh-deploy erfo.en-us: Copy the CNAME file required for gh-deploy to the root directory of the build.

Ich freue mich \u00fcber jede Art von Fe.en-us: I am happy to receive any kind of feedback and support.

Vielen Dank f\u00fcr Ihr Interesse an di.en-us: Thank you for your interest in this plugin!

Dieser Absatz enth\u00e4lt mehrere S\u00.en-us: This paragraph contains several sentences in your source language. It is the recommended way of masking text passages and provides Deepl with more context to deliver a better translation.

Dieser Text repr\u00e4sentiert Ihre Quel.en-us: This text represents your source language

Das Plugin analysiert Markdown-Texte und.en-us: The plugin analyzes Markdown texts and evaluates masked text passages that are enclosed with {[ and ]}. These delimiter are removed when the page is rendered and the source and target language are displayed correctly on your page.

Da der Algorithmus die Zeichen <code>{[<.en-us: As the algorithm uses the characters {[ and ]} as masking for translatable text, these characters cannot be documented directly in the text. Instead, hints are used, which are automatically converted to {[ and ]} after translation.

Begrenzungszeichen (z.B. <code>{[</code>.en-us: Ignore delimiters (e.g. {[ and ]}) within a masking.

Markdown Export beim ersten durchlauf vo.en-us: Markdown export on first run of serve, build or gh-deploy for specified pages and languages with defined path.
